dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome_message: Your AI-powered agricultural assistant is ready to help.

diagnose.title: Crop Diagnosis
diagnose.description: Upload an image to detect crop diseases and get solutions.

discover.smartAlertBody: Ideal humidity and temperature conditions detected.

fertilizer.title: How to make your own fertilizer?
fertilizer.description: Complete guide for organic fertilizer preparation using kitchen waste and cow dung.

irrigation.description: Learn how to set up and maintain a drip irrigation system for water conservation.

pestControl.title: Natural Pest Control Methods
pestControl.description: A guide to using natural predators and neem oil to protect your crops from pests.

cropDiagnosis.title: Crop Diagnosis
cropDiagnosis.descriptionPage: AI-powered crop disease and pest detection
cropDiagnosis.uploadDescription: Upload a file or use your camera to get an AI-powered diagnosis.
cropDiagnosis.uploadArea: Drag & drop file or click to upload
cropDiagnosis.chatInitialMessage: This is the diagnosis based on the image provided. Ask me any follow up questions you might have.
cropDiagnosis.loadingMessage: Analyzing your crop... This may take a moment.
cropDiagnosis.quickDiagnosisDesc: Upload a photo of your crop for instant analysis
cropDiagnosis.noCommonIssues: No common issues found for your location at this time.

cameraDenied.title: Camera Access Denied
cameraDenied.description: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.

cropCalculator.title: Cost Calculator
cropCalculator.descriptionPage: Estimate the cost and potential profit of growing a crop. Provide details like crop type, land size, input costs (seed, fertilizer, labour), and expected market price.
cropCalculator.placeholder: e.g., I want to grow tomatoes in 1 acre. Seed cost is ₹1500, fertilizer ₹2000...
cropCalculator.resultPlaceholder: Your cost calculation will appear here.

cropSelector.title: Crop Selector
cropSelector.descriptionPage: Get suggestions for the best crops to grow. Provide details like land size, location, soil, and season.
cropSelector.placeholder: e.g., I have 2 acres of black soil land in Maharashtra. It's monsoon season with decent water availability.
cropSelector.resultPlaceholder: Your crop suggestions will appear here.

askVyavasaay.title: Ask Vyavasaay
askVyavasaay.description: Your AI assistant for agricultural questions. Ask about market prices, weather, and more.
askVyavasaay.initialMessage: No messages yet. Start the conversation!

marketAnalysis.title: Market Analysis
marketAnalysis.description: Your AI assistant for agricultural market data. Ask about crop prices, trends, and more.
marketAnalysis.initialMessage: Ask a question to get started with market analysis.
marketAnalysis.noData: No market analysis data available at this time.
marketAnalysis.summaryDescription: A brief overview of the current agricultural market conditions in your area.
marketAnalysis.recommendationsDescription: Actionable advice based on the current market analysis.
marketAnalysis.chatInitialMessage: Use this chat to ask for more details on the market analysis.

govtSchemes.title: Govt. Schemes
govtSchemes.findDescription: Enter your details to find government schemes tailored to your needs.
govtSchemes.detailsPlaceholder: Describe your location, crops, farm size, and challenges...
govtSchemes.detailsDefault: I am a farmer in {{location}}. I primarily grow cotton and soybeans. My main challenges are unpredictable weather patterns, access to modern farming equipment, and getting fair market prices for my produce. I own 5 acres of land.
govtSchemes.resultDescription: Here are government schemes we found based on your profile.
govtSchemes.resultPlaceholder: No relevant schemes found based on your profile.
govtSchemes.chatPlaceholder: Ask about eligibility or how to apply...
govtSchemes.chatInitialMessage: Ask for more details about the schemes listed or find other schemes.

wheat.question: When is the best time to harvest wheat?

aphids.question: How to control aphids organically?
aphids.answer: Use neem oil spray (2-3ml per liter), introduce ladybugs, or spray soapy water solution early...

fertilizer.question: Best fertilizer for cotton growth?
fertilizer.answer: Use NPK 19:19:19 at 50kg/hectare during flowering stage. Add organic compost for better soil health.
